meanings.sent1: The flickery candle cast dancing shadows on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The flickery neon sign outside the store caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The flickery light made the room feel like a disco party.
meanings.sent4: Her flickery smile brightened up the gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The flickery fireworks painted the night sky with bursts of color.

meanings.definition: Having a tendency to flicker or flash
meanings.sent1: The old flickery lamp in the corner needed a new bulb.
meanings.sent2: The flickery TV screen was annoying to watch.
meanings.sent3: The flickery streetlight played tricks on the sleepy cat.
meanings.sent4: His flickery phone screen made it hard to read messages.
meanings.sent5: The flickery campfire added a cozy ambiance to the camping trip.

meanings.definition: Characterized by quick, irregular movements or changes
meanings.sent1: The flickery squirrel darted from tree to tree in the park.
meanings.sent2: The flickery butterfly fluttered around the garden gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The flickery leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: His flickery behavior kept everyone on their toes.
meanings.sent5: The flickery water in the stream sparkled in the sunlight.
